message.name: ERR_HEARING_WITNESS_FV_STATUS_NOT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: Status of the hearing case must be scheduled.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_WITNESS_FV_STATUS_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This hearing witness has already been canceled.
This hearing witness has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_WITNESS_FV_THIRDPARTYNOTEXIST
message.locale: No third party participant exists for the appeal case.

message.name: INF_HEARING_WITNESS_FV_CANNOTSENDCORRESPONDANCETOWITNESS
message.locale: There is not sufficient time to send correspondence to witness

message.name: ERR_HEARING_WITNESS_FV_HEARINGNOTHELD
message.locale: Participation cannot be '%1s' as this hearing has not been held.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_WITNESS_FV_EXISTING_AND_CREATE
message.locale: Cannot select an existing person and create a new participant.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGWITNESS_SELECT_ATLEAST_ONE_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: At least one participant should be selected to create a Witness.
